name: The Meticulous Chef
description: A man in an apron meticulously prepares a pasta dish in a modern, red-accented kitchen. He sets a kitchen timer, tends to a pot on the stove, sips a glass of red wine, and carefully plates the spaghetti with sauce, olive oil, cheese, and a basil garnish.

name: A Solitary Feast
description: The man sits alone at a glass dining table in a modern apartment at night. He admires the pasta he cooked, smiles with satisfaction, and begins to eat, pairing it with his red wine.

name: Anxious Preparations
description: Now in a different outfit, the man nervously adjusts a decorative centerpiece on the dining table. He looks around as if waiting for someone, then walks out of the room.

name: The Janitor
description: The man, now dressed as a janitor, is outside the entrance of a modern apartment building, hosing down the pavement. He finishes his work, coils the hose, and looks up at the building.

name: The New Tenants
description: A montage shows various people arriving at the building with luggage. The manager watches as movers bring a large TV box into an apartment, where he interacts with the new residents.

name: Opening Credits
description: A stylized opening credit sequence featuring animated Venus flytraps and the names of the main actors, set against a dark background.

name: The Manager's Domain
description: The manager, Eliseo, is shown performing his duties in and around the lobby. He polishes a plaque, has a tense conversation with a lawyerly resident, handles mail for another, and instructs a repairman outside.

name: Night Business
description: On a cobblestone street at night, Eliseo interacts with a group of homeless people who are sorting through items in shopping carts, appearing to direct them.

name: The Spy
description: Eliseo's duplicitous nature is revealed. He gives a key to a resident, then secretly enters another resident's car in the garage to plant a listening device. Afterwards, he practices a range of emotional expressions in the elevator mirror.

name: A Day in the Life
description: A montage of Eliseo's day shows his varied activities: tending to his Venus flytraps on the rooftop, charming a resident's child with a gift, sweeping, listening at apartment doors, and having tense or awkward encounters with residents in the elevator and their homes.
setting: Various locations within the apartment building

name: The Control Center
description: Eliseo enters a hidden room in the building's basement. He puts on headphones and listens to a residents' meeting where they discuss him. He then examines a massive surveillance board covered with photos, documents, and personal items of every resident, adding a new piece of 'evidence' with a sinister smile.
